name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 17-21, Qixian Town, Shaoxing, Zhejiang.
Policeman Ding Guoqing's home on Huanzhen South Road was demolished by the government. The local street just wrote an IOU to Ding Guoqing, and it has not been paid yet.
Now Ding Guoqing is suffering from a malignant brain tumor and urgently needs money for medical treatment. Ding Guoqing and his family came to the Qixian Street Office to collect debts and defend their rights.
Some netizens said that the demolition was for the construction of the Asian Games venues

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 20, a landslide in Yanqian General Village, Fujian, made it impossible to bring in supplies, and the village was in urgent need of daily necessities.
The local mountaineering association organized volunteers to carry supplies on foot into the disaster area for rescue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A UP host on Bilibili has been collecting and publishing a collection of smart driving accidents of various brands for free for a long time. He has been asked by Huawei to stop updating.
On June 21, the UP host released a video of the chat records between Huawei and him. The video shows that Huawei presented a list of negative comments about Huawei's infringement by the UP host, and threatened that his account has become an account that needs to be cracked down by the Cyberspace Administration of China's Qinglang Operation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guangdong Zhaoqing sealed off Kai County.
On the 15th, the official media publicized that the government spent 200 million yuan to build a new flood control embankment, but it failed to stop the subsequent flood, causing complaints from local residents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Huawei smart driving accident collection

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the flood disaster that is currently happening in southern China, 47 people have died in Meizhou, Guangdong alone. 
However, as of now, the only news on the hot search list of major social platforms that has something to do with the flood is a piece of news on Weibo that the central government has allocated 100 million yuan for emergency road repairs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 21, Guilin, Guangxi. Kelly Furniture Store, located near the intersection of Pingfeng Road in Qixing District, had its furniture soaked by floodwaters. The owner said, "I lost everything overnight."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 22, Su Jiulei, director of Liudaohe Police Station in Xinglong County, Chengde City, Hebei Province, publicly reported on social media that Liu Wenning, deputy head of the Xinglong County People's Government and secretary and director of the Public Security Bureau, was suspected of serious violations of laws and disciplines. The report covered multiple aspects, including acting as a protective umbrella for gangs involved in organized crime, buying and selling official positions, and engaging in power-for-money transactions.
The Xinglong County Discipline Inspection Commission said it was aware of the matter and had intervened in the investigation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/qtQzGhjPTH

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Filial piety leads to strength"
On June 20, Russian students at Guangdong University of Foreign Studies openly used words such as "cingchongji" and "chinanez" to make discriminatory remarks against Chinese people in the dormitory group of international students, which aroused students' dissatisfaction.
After the incident fermented, the school began to track down the students who posted on Xiaohongshu.
The head of the International Students College argued that "cingchongji" is an Internet slang used by young Russians to communicate, not discrimination.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Flood situation in Cha'anpu Town, Taoyuan County, Changde City, Hunan Province on June 22.
As of the time of submission (two hours ago), no official news other than the release of a red rainstorm alert has been seen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Guilin victims questioned on social media that the flood was not a natural disaster but largely a man-made disaster.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Ikx7f4GlQz

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Filial piety leads to strength"
On June 20, Russian students at Guangdong University of Foreign Studies openly used words such as "cingchongji" and "chinazes" to make discriminatory remarks against Chinese people in the international student dormitory group, which aroused students' dissatisfaction.
After the incident fermented, the school began to track down the students who posted on Xiaohongshu.
The head of the International Students College argued that "cingchongji" is an Internet slang used by young Russians to communicate, not discrimination.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 21, the Hebei Discipline Inspection and Supervision Commission issued a notice that the former captain of the urban sanitation team of Handan City's Urban Management Law Enforcement Team, either by himself or by arranging for his subordinates to borrow other people's bank cards, falsely reported and embezzled more than 5.56 million yuan in sanitation workers' wages over a period of eight years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 22, Sinovac Biotech issued an announcement that the company was required to pay additional taxes and late fees of 21.3111 million yuan. The company has paid the above taxes and late fees as required, and the competent tax department has not imposed any penalties on the matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This is Sinovac Biotech Co., Ltd., a pharmaceutical manufacturer in Jinan, Shandong. The company that produces Sinovac vaccines is Sinovac Biotech Co., Ltd., a Beijing-based company.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 21, the Legislative Affairs Commission of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress held a press conference and announced that it would revise and improve the expressions such as "damaging the spirit of the Chinese nation and hurting the feelings of the Chinese nation" in the "Public Security Administration Punishment Law (Draft Revised)".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 21, Guilin, Guangxi. The teaching assistant of Guilin University of Electronic Science and Technology notified students in the group that due to the flooding of Guilin City and other reasons, Teacher Xi Gai could not go into the mountains to teach, and classes would be suspended this afternoon.
Then the teaching assistant urgently added a notice, saying that in order not to delay the students' studies, the teacher overcame difficulties and swam out of the flooded area to teach the students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 21, Shanghai. A woman posted a video saying that the police came to her house because her child searched for keywords such as explosives and guns on her phone. In the end, the child was taken to the police station to make a statement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 22, in Renli Village, She County, Anhui Province, a woman posted a video saying that on the 20th, the village committee relocated residents in the east of the village, but not those in the west, which caused her grandfather to die in the flood and left behind her grandmother who suffers from Alzheimer's disease. If the village committee had relocated residents in the west at the same time, would her grandfather have been able to escape the disaster?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Students added
The school argued that "cingchongji" means "cool" in Korean, and then argued that "cingchongji" is a Mongolian insecticide.
Ironically, the international student dormitory also posted a clear prohibition of discrimination, saying that the school will severely punish such behavior if it occurs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 22, Meizhou, Guangdong. A couple's farmhouse, which they had run for 13 years in Xinpu Town, was destroyed by a flood. The owner looked at the ruins in front of him and choked up and said, "It's so unfair. We worked very hard and built it from scratch, and now we have to start all over again."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In She County, Anhui Province, the tobacco and liquor store run by Jiang Minfang was flooded again, and all the goods were destroyed overnight again. Jiang Minfang cried, "Fengle Reservoir has released water twice in four years. Do you want to let people live?" In the She County flood in 2020, her warehouse was flooded and lost 20 million.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 22, Huaihua, Hunan. Heavy rain and waterlogging occurred in Wuqiangxi Town in the early morning.
Local residents revealed: Heavy rain suddenly fell last night, and the water could not be drained, causing waterlogging. It is known that an old man and a child were drowned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 22, a natural gas pipeline exploded in Songyuan, Jilin Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 22, all six people buried in the Qingyuan Mountain Temple in Taiba Town, Shanghang County, Fujian Province have been found. After confirmation, none of them had any vital signs.
When the flood hit on the 16th, Zhang Song and his family fled to the temple on the mountain for safety. That night, he posted his last circle of friends, with a picture of the endless flood and the temple gate, saying that the front and back were flooded and they could only live on the top of the mountain.
A few hours later, a landslide occurred nearby, the temple was buried, and the family of six lost contact.
